scripts.build: npm run typecheck && esbuild src/bg.ts src/popup.ts src/intercept.ts src/viewer.ts --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --outdir=dist && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.scripts:help:
node -e "console.log('Scripts:
  build              Compile TypeScript and bundle to dist
  build:clean        Clean dist and artifacts, then build
  clean              Remove dist and artifacts output
  copy:static        Copy public assets and generate manifest to dist
  deps:check         Run npm-check-updates via npx
  format             Format files with Biome
  format:fix         Format files with Biome and write changes
  lint               Run Biome checks
  lint:fix           Run Biome checks and write changes
  test:all           Clean build, then run formatting, linting, unit, and E2E tests
  test:e2e           Build and run Playwright E2E tests
  test:unit          Run Vitest unit tests
  test:unit:coverage Run Vitest unit tests with coverage
  typecheck          Run tsc type checking
  watch              Bundle to dist in watch mode')"
scripts.test:all: npm run build:clean && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json
